projects.title: Watch Now
projects.description: Watch Now is a video sharing app built with React and JavaScript. The app's user interface is designed using React components, allowing for efficient and modular development. JavaScript is used extensively throughout the app to handle complex logic and data processing. This app also incorporates other technologies such as HTML, CSS, and APIs to deliver high-quality video and audio content to users.

projects.title: Get Fit
projects.description: Get Fit is a fitness app built with React and JavaScript. React components are used to allow for easy customization and updates. JavaScript gives the app complex functionalities, such as personalized workout recommendations. This app also uses HTML, CSS, and APIs to deliver an interactivre and dynamic experience for users.

aboutpara: My name is David Razo, and I am a self-taught software developer. I have always had a passion for technology, and I love building things that people find useful and enjoyable. I started my journey in software development by teaching myself the basics of programming through online resources and tutorials. Over time, I gained more and more knowledge and experience, working on various projects to hone my skills. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

resume.description: As a self-taught software developer, I have gained a deep understanding of programming concepts and technologies through personal study and hands-on practice. I am now seeking a job opportunity where I can apply my autodidact knowledge and experience to contribute to a team and develop innovative solutions.

experiences.position: Private Client Banker/Manager on Duty at JPMorgan Chase
experiences.bullets: Achieved role as Acting Manager whenever Manager needed support, Trained new employees and supported them throughout onboarding
Led a team assembled from different departments in order to meet clients' finacial needs, Quickly adaptled to new technology in systems throughout my carreer
